actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow nontaxable employer matching contributions to section 529 college savings plans.
short_title: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013

summary.text: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of an employee amounts, up to $1,000, paid by an employer to a qualified college savings assistance plan for a designated beneficiary.

titles.title: Help Kids Save for College Act of 2013
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow nontaxable employer matching contributions to section 529 college savings plans.
